p: The first case of COVID-19 was reported in Singapore on 23 January 2020. As the number of cases increased, a stay-at-home order and ‘cordon sanitaire’ – termed ‘circuit breaker’ – was implemented as a preventative measure on 7 April 2020 [2]. For the purpose of this article, a comparison was made between antibiotic use pre-COVID-19 (1 February–30 April 2019) and antibiotic use during the acceleration phase of the pandemic (1 February–30 April 2020).
